moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Download and/or Execute
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will download a file by importing urlmon via railgun.
        The user may also choose to execute the file with arguments via exec_string.
author: RageLtMan <rageltman@sempervictus>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: URL
options.description: Full URL of file to download

options.name: EXEC_STRING
options.description: Execution parameters when run from download directory
